document.full_text: for derek jeter, the chase for 3,000 hits comes amid talk of his decline as a player, while alex rodriguez's pursuit of the career home run record comes with an asterisk.
document.title: on baseball: two yankees and two milestones, but mixed emotions
lines_and_colors: for derek jeter, the chase for 3,000 hits comes amid talk of his decline as a player, while alex rodriguez's pursuit of the career home run record comes with an asterisk.
